replies.msg:
跟硬件post師兄砌左條新女

Intel Core i7-10700K
ASUS 華碩 TUF GAMING Z490-PLUS (WI-FI) Z490
Thermaltake DDR4 4400MHz Kit (2x8GB) TOUGHRAM RGB
NZXT Kraken X73 RGB 360MM CPU Liquid Cooler

全部野都用得幾好
條ram會上4400係因為我講明先高fps pubg

開左xmp 打pubg會hang機
想問下點樣手動set做3600mhz (setting可以穩定地run)

而家冇開xmp用住先 so far都ok既 不過唔想浪費左條ram
